description: This is the entry JavaScript file for a React-based frontend application. It initializes the React DOM root and renders the main App component inside React.StrictMode, setting up the React application with styling from index.css.

methods.name: createRoot
methods.description: Creates a React root for rendering the app into the DOM element with id 'root'.

methods.name: render
methods.description: Renders the React application inside the created root, wrapping it with React.StrictMode.
